entry.title: Radio Silence
entry.summary:
Author: Desscard

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,611Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 30

Summary: His cell was the guest room in his parents’ house.It was a space designed for temporary stays, not for a broken man trying to piece his life back together. Two twin beds stood on opposite walls, a stark, silent testament to the chasm that had opened between him and Shannon. His son, Christopher, slept down the hall in what used to be Eddie’s childhood bedroom, a decision his mother had made with a cheerful finality that had left no room for argument. "It will be better for the boy to have his own space, something that feels like his," she'd said, oblivious to the quiet erasure it represented. Eddie wasn't the son returning home; he was a guest, a problem to be managed.Or: Eddie returns to El Paso

entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,756Chapters: 16/17Kudos: 52

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,473Chapters: 22/23Kudos: 428

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: my time, my wine, my spirit, my trust
entry.summary:
Author: brandspankin_new

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,440Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: Bright. Too bright.Eddie squeezed his eyes shut as he gradually woke.He groaned as he rolled over, fumbling for the phone he hoped would be charging on his side table.  12:46  Glad he had a 48-off, Eddie checked his notifications. Nothing. Unsurprisingly, Chris hadn’t texted.As he willed for a message from Chris to come anyway, a text from Buck popped up.  did you mean to send this haha  Brow furrowing, Eddie navigated to the messages he had apparently sent the night before.He stared down at the screen.  youre so prettty I qwish you weree a girl; OR Buck's return to his Firehose days after his breakup with Tommy has Eddie spiraling and getting drunk at a wine night with Hen and Karen. It works out after some chaos.

entry.title: Notifications & Noticing Vacations
entry.summary:
Author: eliopiled

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,948Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 49

Summary: At first, it was the little things, like how Buck always sat facing the door, and how he was quick on his feet, even in situations where danger wasn't relevant. Eddie noticed how Buck never carries anything with his right hand, and how he was very protective of his privacy. He noticed how Buck would always reach for his right ankle or his left hip when danger was afoot. He noticed how Buck never flinched at loud noises. He noticed how Buck would get a call every couple days and walk out to his Jeep to take this "Very Important & Secretive Call".He realized how Buck would disappear during the last weekend of every month, to "Visit Family", and for the past two summers that Eddie's worked at the station, Buck leaves for two weeks every June.Eddie noticed the notifications and the frequent vacations.——Buck is a Navy SEAL Reserve, and Eddie is noticing some things.

entry.title: where the doors lock, love breaks through
entry.summary:
Author: hayzs

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,704Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: When Buck is badly injured and trapped in a warehouse under lockdown, time is running out. Surrounded by steel and silence, he clings to the family he’s chosen—especially Chris, the closest thing he has to a son.“I want Chris to have this. I need Chris to have it. Can you please do that for me, Eds?”Eddie’s voice cracks. “You’ll give it to him yourself when you get out of here. You hear me?”Then — the lockdown lifts. The team rushes to his side.Eddie drops to his knees beside Buck, checking his pulse, desperate for a sign of life.His hand trembles as he checks again, but still, there’s nothing.His heart stops when Buck’s doesn’t beat.In the darkest moments, love becomes the fire that won’t let him go.(Or: Buck is badly injured and trapped, but his love for Chris and the 118 drives him to fight for every breath.)

entry.title: Happy Birthday, Dear Husband.
entry.summary:
Author: harixxdiaz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,438Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 159

Summary: “Uh, thanks?” He said as he blushed a bit.Okay, now Eddie was confused. Everyone was looking at the two of them.“I KNEW you two were married!” Ravi exclaimed.“Sorry what? Married?? Ravi, what are you talking about?” Eddie asked, confused.“Eddie, hun. Look at the card.” Athena said.Buck handed Eddie the card, Eddie took it and looked at it. “What? It’s just a card with penguins on it.” He was so confused.“Read what it says.” Ravi said.Eddie looked at it more closely, it read Happy birthday, Dear Husband. Oh shit. Eddie buys a birthday card for Buck without reading what it says.

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,900Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 351

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until, by a twist of fate, they bring him face to face with Buck himself.This AU is canon divergent. Some things change but some stay the same.

entry.title: War Of Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: miladystark

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,065Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 266

Summary: Lieutenant Commander Evan Buckley has survived war zones, covert missions, and enough explosions to fill a lifetime—but nothing prepared him for Staff Sergeant Eddie Diaz, the army medic with a sharp tongue and zero regard for rank.They clash, they fight, they bleed—and somewhere between they start to fall. Slowly. Stupidly. Against all odds. Because in a world where every second counts, love is the one thing they never trained for. Sergeant Eddie Diaz didn’t look up until he heard boots and yelling.“Careful!” he said, deadpan, as the team deposited Buck—still resisting—onto the cot. “We wouldn’t want to bruise his ego any further.”“You’re the medic?” Buck growled, glaring up at the man with messy curls and sharp eyes.“No,” Eddie replied dryly, pulling on gloves. “I’m the fairy godmother. You got a wish?”

entry.title: Between his hand - Part. 2 - Obsession
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,755Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 28

Summary: Buck thought he'd found his place, but with Eddie, nothing is ever simple...From the very beginning of their relationship, Buck is swept away by the burning intensity Eddie offers him. Dominant, mysterious, and sometimes disconcerting, the businessman will stop at nothing to break down his defenses.Took to a secluded villa on the coast, Buck discovers a world of desire and trust where every boundary is redefined. But once their bodies have calmed down, doubts creep in. What does Eddie really want from him?When the past resurfaces in the form of Shannon, Christopher's unstable mother, the fragile balance they were trying to build falters. Between hurtful silences and shattering revelations, Buck will have to choose: run away again... or face his obsession.I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: Long Overdue
entry.summary:
